channel.title: About Piklist on Piklist Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in About Piklist on Piklist Documentation

item.title: Benefits of using Piklist
item.description: Piklist makes it super simple to add fields and data to almost every part of WordPress: Use minimal code to generate complex fields. Code-based for maximum flexibility. Use the same field code to generate a post-meta field or a settings field or a user field… Packed with hooks and filters so you can modify almost everything in WordPress. Enterprise level code quality.

item.title: License
item.description: The license under which the Piklist software is released is the same as WordPress; the GPLv2 (or later) from the Free Software Foundation. A copy of the license is included with every copy of Piklist, but you can also read the text of the license here.
